name: Pico Bricks
description:
Hey everyone! 

This is my very first game made only by me from start to finish. This prototype was only possible with the help, and the amazing tutorials made by Lazy Devs Academy. You should definitely subscribe to their channel.

Talking about the game: 

  • It's a straightforward breakout game; 
  • You can change the angle based on the pad direction;
  • There are 3 types of bricks:
    • Regular brick = You only need to hit it once
    • Hardened brick = You have to hit it twice
    • Indestructible brick = You can't break it
  • You can play through 8 different levels
